title: Dialogue
description: Contains all dialogue for a game in RPG-E 4U&ME

initial_actor.title: Initial Actor
initial_actor.description: The actor which dialogue has been initiated with. An actor can potentially be anything: An NPC, another player character, an inanimate object (i.e. 'The bookshelf has many old books').

defaults.description: When no special cases are satisfied, these are the normal dialogue lines that occur

special_dialogue.title: Special Dialogue
special_dialogue.description: A pairing of a special condition and dialogue for that special condition

condition.description: A condition in which the dialogue property is relevant to be acted TODO I don't know how to represent this yet

dialogue.title: Dialogue
dialogue.description: A series of speaking lines or internal thoughts resulting from a dialogue engagement

line_of_dialogue.title: Line of Dialogue
line_of_dialogue.description: A speaking line or internal thought which can be combined to form dialogue

actor.description: Name of the actor who speaks or thinks the line
